translated: That is free from dust, because the dust of afflictions is abandoned.

original: pa'i phyir ro/_/rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni/_de nyid dang sbyor ba'o/_/stong pa nyid
analyzed: pa'i phyir ro/_/rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni/_de nyid dang sbyor ba'o/_/stong pa nyid
translated: Yoga is the union with that.

original: ces bya ba yang gzung ba la sogs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/'dir yang dkyil🔽'khor la sogs pa stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i ngo bo'i byang chub kyi
analyzed: ces bya ba yang gzung ba la sogs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/'dir yang dkyil 'khor la sogs pa stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i ngo bo'i byang chub kyi

analyzed: sems kyi tshhul gyis bsgom par bya'o zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o/_/'dir dgug

analyzed: sogs pa'i dbus su 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa bltas nas gtor ma'i snod
translated: The yogin of the deity, having visualized the guardians of the world and so on in the center of a triangular maṇḍala of sugarcane,🔽and so on, should offer the bali.

original: du rdzas thams cad blug pa la sogs pa bzhag pa rnams dang /_bdud rtshi lnga dang lhan cig tu cha gnyis su byas nas g.yon pa'i cha rang gi lha'i zhal du rang gi lces
analyzed: du rdzas thams cad blug pa la sogs pa bzhag pa rnams dang /_bdud rtshi lnga dang lhan cig tu cha gnyis su byas nas g.yon pa'i cha rang gi lha'i zhal du rang gi lces

analyzed: dbul bar bya'o/_/g.yas pa ni drag po nag po la sogs pa'i kha ru yang ngo /_/om
translated: The right part is also placed in the mouth of black wrathful ones and so on.🔽The mantra is oṃ bhakṣa and so on.

analyzed: gtor ma dang bza' ba la sogs pa lta bar bya zhes bya ba'i don to/_/kha ni
translated: The meaning of the mantra is “eat, eat, eat.”

original: bkang nas zhes bya ba ni/_des lha rnams kyi dgang bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don te/
analyzed: bkang nas zhes bya ba ni/_des lha rnams kyi dgang bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don te/

analyzed: de dang dgyes par bya'o/_/rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma bsgoms na zhes bya ba ni/_phyi
translated: They are pleased with that.🔽“If one meditates on yoginīs” means that the five meats and five elixirs are offered to the five yoginīs.

translated: Having meditated on the outer and inner deities, one should perform the bali and drinking water.🔽“Just as it is” means that this bali should be offered with the rite in the🔽activities of pacifying and so on.

analyzed: ma 'di cho gas sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to/_/de'i phyir zhi ba zhes bya ba la

analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rnam par 'grel pa'i bshad sbyar zhes bya ba/

analyzed: sogs pa gsungs te/_rgyud 'dir las kyi phyag rgya thams cad du mngon par
translated: In this tantra, all karmamudrās are asserted to be🔽vajra ḍākinīs.

analyzed: 'dod do/_/'di ltar yang tshan dan dmar pos dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa nye

analyzed: shar du drag po chen po glang po che la zhon zhing ser po rdo rje 'dzin cing glang po'i

analyzed: pa/_phyag g.yon pa gnyis kyis ni/_ba dan gsum pa dang ril ba spyi blugs

analyzed: pa sbrul mgo grangs bdun pa zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/_/rlung du rga ba la 'das pa

analyzed: log par 'dren pa ser po/_skyes bu la zhon pa lcags kyu dang ga da 'dzin pa'o/_/

analyzed: 'di rnams ni ral pa 'dzin pa'o/_/rgyan thams cad dang /_rang dang mtshhungs
translated: They all have matted hair, are adorned with all ornaments,

analyzed: pa'i chung ma can thal mo sbyar cing /_gzhan pa'i phyag gnyis kyis bcom ldan

analyzed: 'das la phyag 'tshhal ba'o/_/gtum mgo ma la sogs pa ni/_drag po nag po lta bu'o/_/
translated: Caṇḍī and so on are like black Rudra.

analyzed: rnam par rgyal ma la sogs pa drag po chen po lta bu'o/_/nag mo chen mo la sogs pa

analyzed: lhas byin lta bu'o/_/'jigs ma la sogs pa ni nag po lta bu'o/_/g.yo ldan ma la

analyzed: sogs pa ni gtshigs pa lta bu'o/_/gzugs chen ma la sogs pa ni dam pa lta bu'o/_/
translated: Mahāśobhā and so on are like Śiva.

analyzed: thod pa'i phreng ba la sogs pa rnams ni rga ba las 'das pa lta bu'o/_/ral gri lag

analyzed: pa ma la sogs pa ni/_log par 'dren pa lta bu'o/_/mche ba ma dang gtshigs ma
translated: The sword-handed one and so forth are like those who lead astray.

original: dang /_'khyud ma dang /_kha tam ga'i lag pa ma dang /_ral gri'i lag pa ma dang / dgra sta'i lag pa ma dang /_rdo rje'i lag pa ma dang /_gzhu'i lag pa ma ste re
analyzed: dang /_'khyud ma dang /_kha tam ga'i lag pa ma dang /_ral gri'i lag pa ma dang / dgra sta'i lag pa ma dang /_rdo rje'i lag pa ma dang /_gzhu'i lag pa ma ste re
translated: The fang-handed one, the joint-handed one, the embracing one, the sword-handed one, the enemy-axe-handed one, the vajra-handed one, and the bow-handed one are the eight goddesses.

original: re'i phyag gis bdag po'i mtshhan ma bor la rang gi ming gi mtshhan ma 'dzin par
analyzed: re'i phyag gis bdag po'i mtshhan ma bor la rang gi ming gi mtshhan ma 'dzin par
translated: Each of them drops the sign of the lord and holds the sign of her own name.

analyzed: byed cing /_'khyud pa ni lag pa gnyis kyis 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa ste/
translated: The embracing one has the mudra of embracing with both hands.

analyzed: lhag ma'i phyag gis gtsho bo'i mtshhan ma 'dzin pa'o/_/gal te yang gtum mgo
translated: The remaining goddesses hold the sign of the lord with one hand.

original: ma la sogs pa rnams kyi kha dog la sogs pa 'dir gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor la
analyzed: ma la sogs pa rnams kyi kha dog la sogs pa 'dir gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor la
translated: If the colors and so forth of Caṇḍī and so forth are praised here in the dhāraṇī maṇḍala,🔽then at this time of giving the bali offering, they are not

analyzed: bsngags pa/_de'i tshhe 'dir gtor ma sbyin pa'i gnas skabs su mngon par mi

analyzed: 'dod do/_/gtum mgo ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma bzhi bzhi drag po nag po
translated: The four yoginis such as Caṇḍī are black and wrathful.🔽

original: la sogs pa rnams kyi go rims bzhin du so so'i 'khor du gyur par bsgom par
analyzed: la sogs pa rnams kyi go rims bzhin du so so'i 'khor du gyur par bsgom par
translated: The four yoginis, Caṇḍī, and so on, are meditated on as the retinue of Rudra, and so on, respectively.

original: bya'o/_/ye shes lcags kyu'i rab dbye bas/_rang 'dod lha ni mnyes par bya/_/
analyzed: bya'o/_/ye shes lcags kyu'i rab dbye bas/_rang 'dod lha ni mnyes par bya/_/
translated: By the analysis of the hook of gnosis, one should please the deity of one’s desire.

original: zhes bya ba ni/_de'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi re mig la/_dkyil 'khor pa dang bcas pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang gzhan pa bsams nas mnyes par bya'o/_/ye
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni/_de'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi re mig la/_dkyil 'khor pa dang bcas pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang gzhan pa bsams nas mnyes par bya'o/_/ye
translated: Having imagined Vajraḍāka and the rest of the maṇḍala in the center of the maṇḍala, one should please them.

analyzed: shes ni me long lta bu la sogs pa ste/_de rnam par dag pa'o/_/lcags kyu ni/_gu ku da ha na ste/_de rnams kyi dbye bas bdud rtshi lnga dang /_lhan cig gtor ma bzhag pas so/_/lha ni zhes bya ba ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro la sogs pa'i mtshhan nyid
translated: Gnosis is the mirror-like gnosis, and so on, which is their purity.🔽The hook is guh, which is the analysis of those.

original: dang /_drag po nag po la sogs pa'i gzugs 'jig rten pa gong du gsungs pa'i
analyzed: dang /_drag po nag po la sogs pa'i gzugs 'jig rten pa gong du gsungs pa'i
translated: By placing the bali together with the five amṛtas, the deity is the characteristics of Vajraḍāka, and so on, and the worldly forms of Rudra, and so on, as previously explained.

original: rim pas 'thor 'thung bya'o/_/ro langs kyi bsgrub pa gsungs pa/_shra ba bsgrub pa🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/_/sha zad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni/_mtshhon cha mang pos
analyzed: rim pas 'thor 'thung bya'o/_/ro langs kyi bsgrub pa gsungs pa/_shra ba bsgrub pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/_/sha zad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni/_mtshhon cha mang pos
translated: The practice of the vetāla is taught:🔽“The vetāla practice” and so forth.🔽“Emaciated” and so forth means that he is sick from being struck with many weapons and so forth.

original: bsnun pa la sogs pas na ba'o/_/lo yis zad pa zhes bya ba ni/_rgas pa'o/_/
analyzed: bsnun pa la sogs pas na ba'o/_/lo yis zad pa zhes bya ba ni/_rgas pa'o/_/
translated: “Old” means that he is aged.

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rnam par 'grel pa'i bshad sbyar zhes bya ba/
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rnam par 'grel pa'i bshad sbyar zhes bya ba/
translated: The Explanation of the Commentary on the Vajraḍāka

original: g.yan pa mdze sogs zhes bya ba la/_g.yan pa ni spre'i dug go/_/g.yan pa dang mdze la sogs pa'i sbyor ba las/_g.yan pa mdze la sogs pa'o/_/de lta bu'i ro'i
analyzed: g.yan pa mdze sogs zhes bya ba la/_g.yan pa ni spre'i dug go/_/g.yan pa dang mdze la sogs pa'i sbyor ba las/_g.yan pa mdze la sogs pa'o/_/de lta bu'i ro'i
translated: “Leprosy, smallpox, and so forth” means that leprosy is the poison of the monkey, and from the combination of leprosy and smallpox and so forth, there is leprosy, smallpox, and so forth.

original: lus dang por sgrub pa pos spang bar bya'o/_/zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o/_/lhag ma
analyzed: lus dang por sgrub pa pos spang bar bya'o/_/zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o/_/lhag ma
translated: The body of such a corpse should first be abandoned by the practitioner.🔽The rest is easy to understand.

original: ni go sla'o/_/'dir sngags ni/_ha snu zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgod pa'i sngags so/_/
analyzed: ni go sla'o/_/'dir sngags ni/_ha snu zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgod pa'i sngags so/_/
translated: Here the mantra is the mantra of laughter, “Ha snu” and so forth.

original: sa bon zhes bya ba'i ha'o/_/me ni ra'o/_/gnas med ni ya'o/_/spyi gtshug sbyar bar
analyzed: sa bon zhes bya ba'i ha'o/_/me ni ra'o/_/gnas med ni ya'o/_/spyi gtshug sbyar bar
translated: The seed is the syllable ha. Fire is ra. The place is ya.🔽Having made the union of the crown,

original: byas nas ni zhes bya ba ni/_de'i steng du zla ba phyed pa dang thig le sbyin zhes bya ba'i🔽don to/_/mdor bsdus nas spya zhes bya'o/_/'di'i sa bon rdzogs pa las shin tu
analyzed: byas nas ni zhes bya ba ni/_de'i steng du zla ba phyed pa dang thig le sbyin zhes bya ba'i don to/_/mdor bsdus nas spya zhes bya'o/_/'di'i sa bon rdzogs pa las shin tu
translated: the meaning is that one should give the half-moon and the bindu on top of that.

original: rnam par dag pa'i gzugs su ro blta bar bya'o zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o/_/
analyzed: rnam par dag pa'i gzugs su ro blta bar bya'o zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o/_/
translated: In brief, it is called “the seed.” The meaning is that one should visualize the form of the utterly pure hero from the complete seed.

original: mchod par bya zhes bya ba ni/_me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pas mchod par byas🔽shes bya ba'i don to/_/skyes gnas dbus su dgod bya zhing /_zhes bya ba ni chos kyi
analyzed: mchod par bya zhes bya ba ni/_me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pas mchod par byas shes bya ba'i don to/_/skyes gnas dbus su dgod bya zhing /_zhes bya ba ni chos kyi
translated: Worship means that one should worship with flowers, incense, and so on.🔽The place of origin is the place of the secret.

original: 'byung gnas su spya gi sa bon rdzogs pa la/_ro bsgoms nas bsgrub par bya'o
analyzed: 'byung gnas su spya gi sa bon rdzogs pa la/_ro bsgoms nas bsgrub par bya'o
translated: The meaning of “in the middle of the place of origin” is that one should visualize the seed of the hero in the dharmodaya and meditate on the hero.

original: zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o/_/myur du zhes bya ba ni/_yud tsham mo/_/bdag nyid la
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o/_/myur du zhes bya ba ni/_yud tsham mo/_/bdag nyid la
translated: “Quickly” means in an instant.

original: sogs pas ni/_lca'i rnal 'byor rtogs par bya'o/_/gnas ni dbyen pa dang dur
analyzed: sogs pas ni/_lca'i rnal 'byor rtogs par bya'o/_/gnas ni dbyen pa dang dur
translated: The “and so on” includes the yoginīs’ realization.🔽The “place” is a solitary place, a charnel ground, and so on.

original: khrod la sogs pa'i phyogs cig go/_/'du ba ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi 'du ba ste/
analyzed: khrod la sogs pa'i phyogs cig go/_/'du ba ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi 'du ba ste/
translated: The “gathering” is the gathering of the yoginīs.

original: de'i gang du gtan la dbab pa de ni de bzhin no/_/sgrub thabs zhes bya ba ro
analyzed: de'i gang du gtan la dbab pa de ni de bzhin no/_/sgrub thabs zhes bya ba ro
translated: The “determination” is the determination of the place where they gather.🔽The “means of achievement” is the means of achieving the hero.

original: langs kyi sgrub thabs so/_/de'i cho ga ni chu bzang pos khrus la sogs pa ste/_de🔽rjod par byed pa'i le'u bco brgyad pa'o/_/
analyzed: langs kyi sgrub thabs so/_/de'i cho ga ni chu bzang pos khrus la sogs pa ste/_de rjod par byed pa'i le'u bco brgyad pa'o/_/
translated: The “rite” is the rite of bathing with good water, and so on.

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rnam par 'grel pa las le'u bco brgyad pa'o//_//
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rnam par 'grel pa las le'u bco brgyad pa'o//_//

translated: “Changes” means “bound” and “one wind moves in one place.”🔽“In one year” means “in one year of that.”🔽“With the path” means “in that place.”
